title: Remembering Janefield ...
creator_credit: Tribal Communications, Eastern Energy and Land Use Team and State of Victoria, Department of Human Services
brief_description: Provides a brief history of the Janefield Training Centre, Bundoora with both ex-residents and ex-staff members sharing anecdotes and moving reflections on their experiences and years at the institution.
